edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database

Class UserBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database.UserBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Instructor, Student

    public class UserBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A session object that represents an online user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getTypeUser

        public java.lang.String getTypeUser()
        Get the type of user account
        Returns:
        a value INSTRUCTOR.INSTRUCTOR if user is an instructor.
        a value ADMINISTRATOR.ADMINISTRATOR if user is an administrator.
        Finally otherwise a value STUDENT.STUDENT when user is an student.

      • setUserName

        public void setUserName(java.lang.String string)
        Set the username of the online user
        Parameters:
        string - : Username of the user

      • setTypeUser

        public void setTypeUser(java.lang.String string)
        Set the type of user account
        Parameters:
        string - : Set as INSTRUCTOR.INSTRUCTOR if user is an instructor.
        Or set a value ADMINISTRATOR.ADMINISTRATOR if user is an administrator.
        Otherwise set a value STUDENT.STUDENT when user is an student.

        public void setChallenge(java.lang.String str)
        Auxiliary method used by the server to authenticate a user.
        Parameters:
        str - : A challenge string. If server and user are able to solve their challenge string, then user is granted access to FLIP

      • getChallenge

      • checkUserIP

        public boolean checkUserIP(java.lang.String remoteIP)
        This method checks if user is online from two different network devices
        Parameters:
        remoteIP - : User's ip address
        Returns:
        true if the user's ip address declared at begining of the FLIP session is equals to the new one declared. Otherwise false.

      • setOnline

        public long setOnline()
        Set a new online user as "on-line"
        Returns:
        Number of current active sessions of the user

      • isOnline

        public boolean isOnline()
        Check if user is online
        Returns:
        true if user is on-line, false

      • setOffline

        public long setOffline()
        Set an user as off-line. This methods is mainly used when user logs out.
        Returns:
        Number of current active sessions.
